directions: Put all ingredients in the slow cooker, and cook on high for three hours. (Alternatively, you can cook it in a large pot, with the lid on, on the stove for an hour on low heat [set the dial between 1 and 2] until the quinoa is cooked and the sweet potato is tender.)
ingredients: 10-oz can petite diced tomatoes and green chiles (drained)
6-, 7-, or 8-oz sweet potato (peeled and cubed - cubing the sweet potato can be a little difficult - just make sure to use a good knife and start at the middle)
title: Sweet Potato Quinoa Chili
